title: Homework Help
homeworkCheckerDesc: Get your homework reviewed before submitting
homeworkHelperDesc: Get guided help to solve problems yourself
askForHelpDesc: Get guided help with a problem
readyToStartDesc: Choose a tool above to check your homework or get help with a problem. Your activity will appear here.
chatPlaceholder: Ask a question about your homework...
tryAgain: Try again with a different approach

inputMode.howToSubmit: How would you like to submit?
inputMode.taskTextPlaceholder: Paste or type your homework question here...
inputMode.answerTextPlaceholder: Paste or type your answer here...
inputMode.questionTextPlaceholder: Paste or type your homework question here...

check.atLeastOneImage: At least one image is required
check.moreContextHelp: Add more context for better feedback
check.privacyNote: Your uploads are private and only used to generate feedback.
check.heicWarning: This image may not work on some devices. For best results:
check.heicStep1: Open the photo in your Gallery app
check.taskTextPlaceholderExample:
Example:
Solve for x: 2x + 5 = 13

Or:
Calculate the area of a rectangle with length 8cm and width 5cm.
check.answerTextPlaceholderNote: Leave blank if you just want to understand the question.

help.pageSubtitle: Get guided help to solve it yourself
help.socraticDesc: Instead of giving you the answer, I'll guide you with questions and hints to help you discover the solution yourself. This builds real understanding!
help.howToSubmit: How would you like to submit your question?
help.uploadProblem: Upload the problem you need help with
help.dragDropOrClick: Drag & drop or click to upload
help.questionPlaceholder: Paste or type your homework question here...
help.minCharsNeeded: Please enter at least {min} characters ({remaining} more needed)
help.referenceDesc: Optional: add textbook pages, notes, or examples
help.comfortLabel: How comfortable are you with this topic?
help.comfortStuckDesc: I know it, just need a nudge
help.whatTriedLabel: What have you tried so far?
help.whatTriedPlaceholder: Describe any attempts you've made or where you got stuck...
help.privacyNote: Your tutor won't give you the answer directly - they'll help you figure it out!
help.uploadError: Failed to preview image. Please try a different image or format.
help.textTooShort: Please enter at least {min} characters for your question

results.practiceMoreDesc: Strengthen your understanding with practice questions
